item.title: Jaswant Thada and Mehrangarh Fort in Jodhpur city in Rajasthan, India (© Jackyenjoyphotography/Getty Images)
item.description: 图文来源自：bing. copyright: © Jackyenjoyphotography/Getty Images Looking for a taste of royal Rajasthan? Come to Jodhpur and witness the majestic duo of Jaswant Thada and Mehrangarh Fort! Perched atop a rocky hill towering over 122 metres above the plains, Mehrangarh Fort is among Rajasthan’s largest forts. Constructed over a period of 500 years, starting in the mid-15th century, the fort showcases a diverse range of architectural styles spanning different epochs, even including elements from the 20th century.
